overview.title: Learning path competencies
overview.emptyLearningObjectsLabel: This competency doesn't contain any learning objects yet!

generation.title: Welcome to your learning path!
generation.description: This feature lets you learn at your own pace with a personalized journey tailored to your performance. It adapts dynamically, ensuring you always have the most relevant content and challenges. Start now and experience a customized path to success!

completion.title: Congratulations!
completion.description: Congratulations on finishing your current learning path! 🎉 Your hard work has paid off. While new content may be added soon, enjoy this moment of achievement. Stay tuned for more units and keep up the great work!
